thread.title: SA beat India by 5 runs in 1st ODI
thread.title_full: SA beat India by 5 runs in 1st ODI - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: SA beat India by 5 runs in 1st ODI
text: *South Africa beat India by 5 runs to take a 1-0 lead in the five-match ODI cricket series at Green Park, here today.*Brief Scores:South Africa: 303/5 in 50 overs (AB de Villiers 104, Faf Du Plessis 62; Umesh Yadav 2-71, Amit Mishra 2-47).India: 298/7 in 50 overs (Rohit Sharma 150, ; Ajinkya Rahane 60, Mahendra Singh Dhoni 31; ... Â»
